titles.title: Thank You God For Loving Me

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Thank You, God for loving me
Thank You, God for family
In the light and in the night
You always care for me

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Through my joy and through my tears
You're friend who always hears
Thank You, God for loving me, for loving me

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: Thank You, God for giving me ears to hear and eyes to see, hands to touch and lips to sing

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
You made all of me
For friend-sip and for so much more
You're the one that I adore
Thank You, God for loving me for loving me

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Thank You, God for loving me
Thank You, God
You set me free
By Your life and by Your grace

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
I'm Yours eternally
Even when I go a-stray
You are there to show the way

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Thank You, God for loving me for loving me
Thank You for loving me
